data.eml:eml: Batwanema gen. n. and Chokwenema gen. n. (Oxyurida, Hystrignathidae), new nematode genera as parasites of Passalidae (Coleoptera) from the Democratic Republic of Congo

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Morffe, Jans, Garcia, Nayla (2013): Batwanema gen. n. and Chokwenema gen. n. (Oxyurida, Hystrignathidae), new nematode genera as parasites of Passalidae (Coleoptera) from the Democratic Republic of Congo. ZooKeys 361: 1-13, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.361.6351, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.361.6351
